Heavily Armoured

You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Heavily Armoured is a Feats in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

Heavily Armoured Information

You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Class Feature Heavy Armour Proficiency

How to unlock Heavily Armoured

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Heavily Armoured

Medium Armor Proficiency All Classes at Level 4

Heavily Armoured Tips & Notes

If you have a negative Dexterity Modifier it will not be applied to your Armour Class if you wear Heavy Armour. You have to have medium armor proficiency already, so this would be like for a Ranger or maybe a Cleric
